website_summaries.verdict: This is the best option on almost all fronts – a well-made bike that includes user-friendly features, solid design, and value.
pros: Sports a steel frame and fork that is tig welded for durability
Features both hand and rear breaks, comfortable design, and 20-inch wheels for riders of wide age range
cons: It's a bit difficult to put together and the confusing instructions aren't very helpful

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The bike seems to be of good quality minus the front breakpads that are next to useless. Easy assembly out of the box (if you understand anything about putting bikes together). Packaging on the otherhand was sub-par. Small scratches in the paint and broken plastic parts due to this crappy packaging, but not worth my aggravation to return it. Overall Id buy it again and recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bike but lacks quality.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is just ok. Kid has had it for a year now and since then, the tires have either flatten on its own; and or inner tubes have blown out 7-8 times, with everyday street riding to and from school, no abuse! Oh wait—upon receiving the bike, several parts were missing. Amazon did reimburse me for the parts needed, which was kind, but the hassle of it all...not worth the trouble. Should have just driven down the road and pulled a fully assembled bike of the rack. The chain rusted after just a couple months too.
customer_reviews.author: Rodeo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BIKE!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst product I’ve ever purchased on amazon. Not at all what I expected the build is a disaster the instructions we got are if you’re building it from scratch. So the cables for the breaks are to short for the brake handles so it’s impossible to make them fit. We had to spend another $50 for a bike shop to have it put together. It completely ruined my sons birthday, never again will I buy something off this website.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Holds up great
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Holds up great. Looks better than other bikes. This is the best bike I have bought for my Grandsons, and I have bought a lot with 9 of them. This is the bike I would look for again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Eller

customer_reviews.title: If it’s returnable if the purchaser has assembly problems.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bike I got for my grandson for Christmas. However, his dad and granddad had a problem with the brake wiring. It was so tight that it couldn’t be connected. Had to pay 40.00 at the bike shop to have the brakes connected. Was told that the manufacturer had everything too tight, and the wires could have been snapped. Other than that issue, everything else was fine. My grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike is COOL DUDE!!!...The design is amazing, and it is more than i expected, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As others say, the brakes are not set up ...
customer_reviews.text: As others say, the brakes are not set up upon unboxing and if you are not well skilled in mechanics or know what you are doing, this can be a pain. I eventually figured it out without much issue, but it was still a pain. That said, it was assembled on Xmas eve, and by Xmas morning the front tire was flat... Had to spend another $20 to replace the cheap tubes that came with the bike. Do yourself a favor and pick a different bike, there is a lot of assembly with this bike and the directions are not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: The Franklins

customer_reviews.title: my son like it.
customer_reviews.text: omg, had to bring it to a bike shop to get fully assembled after my husband, neighbor and father-in-law gave up. Th ebike shop said next time, for the price I paid for the bike and then to get it professionally assembled, I should have came in and purchased a custom bike..... argh..... but now that's it assembled, my son like it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bicycle, probably a little on the heavy side for my 8 yr old but he has no issues riding it or controlling it, nice features like the pegs and the Gyro freestyle are pretty cool for the kid too.
customer_reviews.author: Gixxer750

customer_reviews.title: Awful & Sent $115 bike for $240
customer_reviews.text: This was not even the right bike!! My son was so excited to receive this and when it arrived it was a completely different bike! You can't really tell a 4 year old who waited patiently for over a week that he can't ride it, so my husband put it together. The absolute worst. The brakes were awful. The threads were awful. Everything about it was awful. Do not purchase from them! Take heed of all these bad reviews and save yourself the headache and upset child when you have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking bike...
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandson and I have yet to give it to him and get his reaction, but was disappointed that information about assembly was not clear or contained in the package. I was not happy to see that the seat had a tear in it, and will be requesting a new one be sent to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Capacitive Stylus Pen by iKross

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really frustrating, looks like it would be a great bike, and I can understand the assembly required, however that would assume that it can be assembled. The hand brake cables don't fit, you can't get the brake cable nipple into the brake lever unless you alter it - you have to adjust it. I'm not about to take a brand new bike to a bike shop to pay to have the brakes installed properly.
customer_reviews.author: TDimo

customer_reviews.title: He counldn't wait thanks guys,on time deliver
customer_reviews.text: Everything was on time and some what difficult when it came to getting the screws out to put the handle bar on to the bike. Not knowing which way to un loose them. I end up stripping them... Sad but true. Over all its still a great bike. Wish he could enjoy it better. Thank a million
customer_reviews.author: Natasha GuidryBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't let me give it zero stars😤 handlebars needed attached ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't let me give it zero stars😤 handlebars needed attached but they had the screws way too tight especially beings it wasn't attached to bike so one screw got stripped and I can't find one to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present and has taken abuse ever since then. like all bikes they stink putting them together. Thats all of them. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kozup

customer_reviews.title: Terrible brakes!
customer_reviews.text: Back brake was defective - did not have spring return groove on one side. Even with adult hand strength, front brake would not stop wheel when rolled on floor. Terrible brakes!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Crazy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: What a shame you will go crazy to assemble this bike
customer_reviews.author: Katy W

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is what we were looking for my son as a beginner
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mora

customer_reviews.title: perfect bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bike. He says "it's the best looking bike in the whole neighborhood" and I can attest to that. The bike was easy to assemble and is strong. The breaks needed to be adjusted, but it was easy with the right tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. The bike showed up in a box and was easy to assemble. Will defiantly re-order from this shipper again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Well made. My son loves it, he is 8 and 49 inches and fits him with a good amount of room to grow. The brakes were somewhat difficult to figure out as the directions were little help. Thankfully a neighbor came to my rescue. Definitly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aprice

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE
customer_reviews.text: Pefect My kids love this bike. It assembly was easy and It really holds up well. I reccommend this one to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble and tire ripped
customer_reviews.text: Product was not easy to assemble, I ordered my kids different bike and this was the only one that gave me trouble. Also not even few months after I got the tire blew on it. I’ve road bikes all my life and never had a tire rip in a matter of months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: As expected... we had no issues assembling and son was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: What not to like. The kids love their new toy. Love the design and quality
customer_reviews.author: Lamin Tunkara

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old boy he loves it's very nice bike at a pretty reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: daved

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike. it ride so soft and perfect If ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike.it ride so soft and perfect If any one need a bike, this is the one. I give this bike 10 star.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: It's A good bike except for the rear brake issue.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue we have with the bike is that the rear brake cable keeps coming off & even the local bike shop cant seem to get it to quit doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Sys it bakes great and she's had no problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin's kid who had her bike stolen at the beginning of the summer. She loves this. Sys it bakes great and she's had no problems. My cousin said it was quick and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the price. My 7 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Bike was not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Bike was ridden by 10 year old grandson and was broke in a matter of a week. Bike was not sturdy at all. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: betty garner

customer_reviews.title: not a great bike
customer_reviews.text: Brake cables are short and difficult to fix. Reflectors were broken. Bike is heavy for a 7 year old and handles are too far away.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Rajaram

customer_reviews.title: 2 flat tires already
customer_reviews.text: We have had to replace the tubes on the front and the back already. My son has only had it since August.
customer_reviews.author: word up11

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son's 10th birthday. He can ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 10th birthday. He can be a little rough on bikes and this thing has survived so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michigirl74

customer_reviews.title: faster to build than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike comes 90% built inside the box took about half an hour to put it together with minimal tools overall quality of the bike is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Fair and balanced

customer_reviews.title: great bike! it was very difficult to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: great bike! it was very difficult to put the brakes together though.
customer_reviews.author: trevor VanHuizen

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: 9yr old loves it! Didn't realize that there are only hand brakes but he had no problem figuring it out. Love this bike!
customer_reviews.author: sunrise

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it. She doesn't like pink or girly colors
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. She doesn't like pink or girly colors. My brother said it was fairly easy to build since the crank is already in the frame when you receive the package.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awful breaks
customer_reviews.text: Front brakes are a joke.. kid likes it but I suggest spending your money elsewhere unless you feel like cursing at inanimate objects.
customer_reviews.author: David Becker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves it! He rides it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This item was over priced for the product, my son has not had nothing but problems with his since he got it.
customer_reviews.author: courtney williams

customer_reviews.title: Brake missing.
customer_reviews.text: One front brake pad was missing completely. And there is no brakes on the peddles. Not sure why not?
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Good chins
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because you can do big jumps and go threw snow piles.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice if it weren't for defects
customer_reviews.text: The back tire won't fill up... Looks like its busted before use? Grest Christmas gift 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it !
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!!!!! Got the bike no bolt for front tire no seat clamp don’t buy !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: teri roldan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this for my granddaughter and she loved it. Sturdy, well made bike.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bike is great had it for a year now still in great working conditions
customer_reviews.author: John Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bike.! Easy to assemble. Delivery was fast and earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great bike,great price.
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Kent bikes. My 9 year old son loves it. Seems to be a very good quality bike.
customer_reviews.author: M125williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and easy to put together. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works good. However, the bike does not come assembled. You will have to finish it up on your own. If you're not familiar with the type of brake system this bike comes with, you may have a bit of trouble getting them to work. Other than that, the bike is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good bike.  Watch for MISSING parts!
customer_reviews.text: First, the product was great. The actual bike was perfect for an eight year old. The front brake configuration on the neck leaves something to be desired.. But fine overall. So why only three stars.. Missing items.. Petals, instructions (though not really needed as its mostly assembled), and pegs.. Kind of important to have petals to use a bike. Unfortunately it was a birthday and returning the item after it was mostly assembled and telling your eight year old that you can't use your favorite present wasn't something I was going to do. Took petals off a old micro bike... Birthday saved.. Item half delivered...
customer_reviews.author: MAustin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is exactly what I want it for my kids. It is tough, and the quality of the parts seems good. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Sencion Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Candidate with his new bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike did it for my son. He is the most happy ten year old you can possibly meet right now.
customer_reviews.author: Elinton A. Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: The colors are so vibrant and really awesome design. It was easy to assemble and so ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike. The colors are so vibrant and really awesome design. It was easy to assemble and so far almost a year later, we've had no trouble out of it at all. My son isn't very reckless, so if your child likes to do bmx stunts I couldn't vouch for durability on excessive wreckage.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade from 16 inch for our 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a tad big for our 6 year olds birthday, but he got used to it the first day and loves it. He'll have this bike for a long time for sure. It looks awesome, too!
customer_reviews.author: tayjade

customer_reviews.title: No instructions for back brakes
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves the bike. The brakes were the hardest thing to do and an easier process or clearer directions would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: motherof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but it did not come with pedals
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike but it did not come with pedals! We had it almost assembled before we realized. I asked if pedals could be sent to us and we were told we had to reassemble it and return the bike to have a new bike sent. Much easier to go out and buy pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this bike for our 9 year old son on his birthday. We were a bit worried that it would be a bit big, but the seat is adjustable and it didnt take him very long to grasp the change of brakes. He went from the reverse peddle brake to handle bar brake. He loved the bike!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C. Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Nice quality. Have a pro assemble it though. Local bike shop charged $60 to fine tune my husband's attempt
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bike
customer_reviews.text: It's was what my son wanted at the best price!! He loved it!!! Even when the first bike got lost amazon sent me another one .
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Santa "brought it" he loves it...but save it in  your archive section when you buy if its a surprise
customer_reviews.text: He loves the bike. I do hate it came from Santa, for him, and he was over my shoulder looking and saw it on my Amazon purchased page =0 Awe well, a couple of months ago he saw text messages to his dad to bring home tooth fairy money... He stood up in Chili's restaurant and announced to the whole place we lied about the tooth fairy. I guess good parents would have deleted the tooth fairy messages from a nosy 10 yr old. The jig is up on Fairies and Santa but after 3 months bike is great, he still loves it. Even if a fat man in a red suit didn't deliver it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bike for a Christmas 2015. In ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for a Christmas 2015. In the first of February the inside treats of the peddle arm ( what the paddle arm screws on to ) stripped. It's now to late to return :(
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Talked to a pro
customer_reviews.text: Apparently Kent is selling these bikes with a strange combination of brake parts. I was told the way they design the back brake system is by compiling two separate systems that weren't meant to work in tandem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Troubleshooter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This bike looks pretty cool and I realize you can't expect much for the price. Bought this for my 12 year old son in August 2016. It was lightly ridden, only cruising around, not off road and no stunts. It is now unrideable. The rear wheel bearing split in half!
customer_reviews.author: Don Ron

customer_reviews.title: But on Christmas morning my grandson was happy. thats all that
customer_reviews.text: Had parts missing. Parts of the brakes were missing. The quick release adjustment on the seat didn't come with it.suppose to. I had to take to a bike shop to get parts to put together. But on Christmas morning my grandson was happy.thats all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this bike
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this bike,bought it for my son for Christmas. It's finally getting nice to put it together and we are missing pieces. So now my son has no bike to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it the colors are awesome it's light and serves the purpose without breaking the wallet nice bike
customer_reviews.author: Heids

customer_reviews.title: I have not put it all together yet but there ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not put it all together yet but there is a lot of scratches and idk if I'm putting together wrong but the front sits higher then the back or is that what a bmx does? The box had holes in it with the brake line poking out and it seems as if the box was dragged...
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Kent Pro Bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but not durable. The back wheel has already been ruined as my son is an avid bike rider - as kids normally are.
customer_reviews.author: donaldschick

customer_reviews.title: What happened to my tires?
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong the bike is great but I had to buy new wheels because they had the bike standing not being used, for however long, and the tires ended up egg shaped.
customer_reviews.author: J-c-charnele

customer_reviews.title: very poor
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a friend and in no time it start giving trouble and right now it not working , i would not recon this to no one .stay far !
customer_reviews.author: Norlan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bike but shipped with issues
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bike for my 8 yr old son. It was delivered on time but in the assembly process and then shortly after realized the contents were jammed so hard in the packaging the rear wheel was bent and the front brake assembly was bent also. I am taking the bike to local shop to see if they can fix the brake assembly and wheel. The wheel I am sure will be fine but the brake assembly probably needs to be replaced. Outside of those 2 issues it is a sharp looking bike that rides well.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: The front tire was bent.. after my husband spent a decent amount of time trying to get it assembled, we had to return the bike. The front tire was completely bent and the brakes won't work properly. Definitely a disappointment since this was supposed to be a gift for Christmas. Luckily we had enough time to get another bike.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: Bought broken bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was ok but I had a problem with the front sprocket and the berrings when it was bilt they cross thread so I bought something that sits in my garage with out use
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo

product_meta.title: Kent Pro 20 Boy's Freestyle Bike, 20-Inch
product_meta.description: The Kent Pro 20 is a serious freestyle bike featuring micro drive. Built to take abuse. Recommended for ages 10 and up.
feature_bullets: Tig Welded Steel Frame and Fork

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
